Hi, we're Sierra. We'd love for you to join us.

Discover your next job at Sierra.

Open roles

At Sierra, we're helping businesses build better, more human experiences with AI. Our team works at the forefront of AI, combining research with a focus on real-world impact. That blend of innovation and practicality drives everything we do, and we’re always on the lookout for thoughtful, mission-driven people.

The Early Career Program

As an early career team member at Sierra, you’ll work directly with customers to build AI agents for leading global brands, gaining mentorship and real-world experience from day one. If you want to shape the most important technological wave of our time and grow alongside top talent, come build at Sierra.

Learn more

Interviewing at Sierra

Our approach to hiring is grounded in the belief that excellence is about more than just functional expertise. During the interview process, we’ll evaluate not only your capabilities, but also how well you align with our values.

Since we work in person, interviews take place at one of our offices. You'll have the opportunity to experience our culture and what it'd be like to work at Sierra.
